name: dizzyingly
content:
dizzyingly adverb
(FEELING DIZZY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel as if everything is turning around, and that you are not able to balance and may fall over: She finds herself dizzyingly twirled around by two of the male dancers. The dizzyingly bright sun and the Pacific stretched out beside him.

dizzyingly adverb
(CONFUSINGLY)
in a way that is complicated or fast, and therefore confusing: It is a long and dizzyingly complex story. The whole enterprise thunders along at a dizzyingly manic, breathless pace.
